column5: Killer report Steve! I always look forward to your spring pike report and this year's did not disappoint    Nice shootin' bud
Oh boy..  That's got my blood pumping!
Them some monsters for sure!!! Btw, what type of leader you using?  It looks nice and thin
I tie my own leaders.  I just buy a spool of 20# coffee wire from Malin, along with some 20# crimps and tie like a mad man the night before opener lol.
Thems some excellent gators man! It seems that something even bigger has been trying to eat a few them haha.
Great monsters Steve  . What are you using for a camera?,the pictures are super clear.!!
Just a cheap camera. Nikon Coolpix L120
Nice gators bud. You got yer boat fixed?
Beauties Steve, knew there was a missing pike report due here

Sadly I was primed to head north for pike this month but had to bow out when the weeks kept getting pushed back due to "ice" still on the lakes up north and the work schedule built up.  But this little diddy gets me primed for a couple other pike tours ahead.  Good fishing Steve.  Some beat up spawned out chunkers and some clean mean machines too.  Love the pikes.
Beauties Steve! I am going to get out for pike this week... hoping to get into a few like those!
